@username #TheRules Avoid personal statements, built the "meaning" through "conversations".
@username Use hashtag wisely, do not "over hashatg" your tweets.
@username #Therules Twitter micro syntax forms and conversational tagging create, through tweetonomy, a “Twitter grammar”. Learn it!
@username #The Rules: Content is king, personal stuff is oversharing
